slider2.text: Cuisine Vive another option to eat healthy

slider3.text: If you do not have time to cook, if you are looking for a paleo, vegetarian and gluten-free option, or if you want to surprise your guests with new recipes, Cuisine Vive is the answer.

slider4.subtext: When you spend more than $ 60 before taxes.

slider6.text: Do not worry about your allergies, it will be our pleasure to make you eat healthy.

contenu.title: About Cuisine Vive
text: A Chef, A Kitchen, A Dream

It‘s been scientifically proven that what we eat has a direct impact in our body’s functioning Andre Luis saw this reality and he had the challenge  to reinvent several recipes of traditional cuisine when he began working in a Day care in Montreal where he had to deal with all kinds of intolerances, food allergies and restrictions in his job.
The Andre’s biggest concern  was to have the kids  eat more fruits and vegetables, while avoiding conservatives,  greasy food and unhealthy snacks.

Everything had to be served in healthy food  portions including essential aliments for their development. He succeeded! He makes them eat his soups, couscous salad, the energy balls, and cereal bars, and lots of other dishes he prepares every day in a CPE in Montreal. Surprised parents would come by an request his recipes because their children would not eat some sorts of food when they are at home.

Cuisine Vive was created by chef Andre as another option to eat well for life. Cuisine Vive offers homemade carefully prepared dishes without conservatives. When you do not have time to cook, when looking for a paleo option, vege and gluten free or simply when you want to surprise your guests with new recipes.

contenu.title: How does it work?
contenu.text: The modern  lifestyle is crazy busy. With a  full work schedule, travels,  small children or all of the above, a healthy cooking may be the last thing on your mind. Cuisine Vive is here to help you save time in grocery shopping,  recipe –hunting and cooking Easy!.
list: Check out our weekly menu posted every Friday morning.
Click on the quantities you want to order and they automatically will be added to your chart.
Fill out the form with you basic information and we will confirm you order within 24 hours by email and txt message.
Orders can be placed until Thrusday midnight.
Meals are freshly prepared and delivered right to your home over the weekend.
Pay with Debit Card, Credit Card, Interac or Cash on your  delivery day.
You can also save 5% on your purchase if you pick up your order.
We will contact you to confirm the delivery date and time.
We offer FREE SHIPPING on all orders over $ 60 (before taxes).

contenu.title: Cuisine Vive Menu
contenu.text: Our menu has been carefully created thinking of each of the plates of our customers with the idea of ​​satisfying them. Our dishes are healthy, well-proportioned and really delicious.

contenuLeft.text: Be the first to be informed about Cuisine Vive’s news, offers and events.

contenu.title: Contact Us
